rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is the street where lots of shops
are gathered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0002
rows.name: We BLADE members get our equipment sorted out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0003
rows.name:
BLADE members take on
dangerous missions every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's an essential place for protecting those lives.
That's what this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
They sell not only the infantry gear we call Inner,
but also Doll frames and equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Dolls are super expensive, but
you want your own a Doll someday, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Next, that big building that was in front of
the transport landing zone[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Let's go to the core of NLA,
the BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]
